title: wine_Cave_du_Roi_Dagobert_2013_Altenberg-Bergbieten_Grand_Cru_Riesling_(Alsace)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 10912.
country: France.
description: A touch of evolution is immediately apparent: that chamomile lift and dried citrus peel nose gives it away. The  dry palate then serves up notions of ripe but tart apple, incisive lemon freshness and a more generous, fluid rich texture that play off each other beautifully. On the finish it is the lemon that shines, alongside some notions of candle wax and more chamomile. A lovely snapshot of a Riesling on its trajectory. Drink 2017-2027..
designation: Altenberg-Bergbieten Grand Cru.
points: 93.
price: 80.0.
province: Alsace.
